title: Emilio's story
creator_contributor_role: FILEF - Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families, co-ordinator
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: A personal story of migrant experience by Emilio D'Ambrosio
description: In 1952 Emilio left his family behind in Italy to come and earn money in Australia. He didn't see them again until they came to join him 9 years later. Instead of a place to become rich and leave, Australia became his home. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006194; Racconti: La Voce del popolo = The Voice of the people; Active; 2003
